dev
Class MetadataUpdater

java.lang.Object
  dev.MetadataUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updater.Listener, DeviceUpdater.Listener
public class MetadataUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updater.Listener, DeviceUpdater.Listener

The event handler which updates the metadata with the remote machine whenever the updater or devices signals a change event.

Author:
Mamta

          The current list of devices.

Method Detail

updated

public void updated(Database db)
This is invoked by the updater thread if something is changed in the database. This function pushes the database to other devices.

Specified by:
updated in interface Updater.Listener

added

public void added(Device device)
This is invoked when a new device becomes online. This object sends the metadata to that new device. It also changes the device status to online in the database.

Specified by:
added in interface DeviceUpdater.Listener

removed

public void removed(Device device)
This is invoked when a device goes offline. It just changes the device status to be offline in the database.

Specified by:
removed in interface DeviceUpdater.Listener
